title: ICE on proc macro --extern import

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```sh echo | rustc --crate-type proc-macro --crate-name p - echo '#![no_core] use p;' | rustc --target msp430-none-elf --edition 2018 --extern p -L . - ``` - Use a non-installed target or a target spec file. - `#![no_core]` is there to avoid having to build `core` etc. in the repro. - Explicit paths (`--extern p=libp.so`) or `extern crate p;` do not trigger the issue. ### Meta Latest stable (1.49.0) and nightly break. ### Error output ``` panicked at 'compiler/rustc_resolve/src/imports.rs:1049:33: inconsistent resolution for an import' ```
Backtrace

``` 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::{{closure}} 2: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::{{closure}} 3: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 4: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_resolve::imports::ImportResolver::finalize_import::{{closure}} 7: rustc_resolve::imports::ImportResolver::finalize_import 8: rustc_resolve::imports::ImportResolver::finalize_imports 9: rustc_resolve::Resolver::resolve_crate 10: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand_inner 11: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand::{{closure}} 12: rustc_data_structures::box_region::PinnedGenerator::new 13: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 14: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::expansion 15: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 16: rustc_span::with_source_map 17: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 18: rustc_span::with_session_globals ```
